text: Murder Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Georgia. According to tradition, Murder Creek received its name in the late 1700s when a robbery and murder occurred near its banks. ==References== Category:Rivers of Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Bodies of water of Jasper County, Georgia Category:Bodies of water of Newton County, Georgia Category:Bodies of water of Putnam County, Georgia
title: Murder Creek (Georgia)
